meanings: sure, certain, confident, positive, definite, (명백하다) indisputable

vlive.korean: 정말 소소하지만 확실한 행복 아닙니까 그게? 그거야말로? It's a small thing but it will make you feel so happy. Right? 듣기 View video OUI ENTERTAINMENT : [#YO_LIVE]요한이를 바라봄🌼
vlive.english: It's a small thing but it will make you feel so happy. Right?

vlive.korean: 쟤가 확실한 것 같다 그치? I think it's definitely him. Right? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 교복 입고 콘돔 사러갔을 때 리얼 반응_EP16_[라이크LIKE]
vlive.english: I think it's definitely him. Right?

vlive.korean: 그래요? - 네 - 이거 확실한 건가요? Really? - Yes. - Are you sure? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#335. 새옹_지마 (w. 최병찬, 이세진, 유리)
근데 그... 내가 쥐고 있는 확실한 열쇠들? But the keys that I firmly control? 듣기 View video BTS : 진짜 오랜만 🤣🤣
vlive.english: But the keys that I firmly control?

vlive.korean: 아주 확실한 처방전을 가지고 있는데 들어볼래? I have the ultimate prescription for that, do you want it? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 짝녀의 소개팅남이 학교 핵인싸라면?_EP15_[라이크LIKE]
vlive.english: I have the ultimate prescription for that, do you want it?
